name: Dark MongoDB Docs
description:
Dark theme for MongoDB documentation.

  • Changelog can be found here.
  • If you find any issues, create an issue here.
  • Feel free to send me pull requests if you'd like to contribute.

It is now in a condition that I am proud of. Please let me know if there are any visual glitches, as edge cases are likely the only cases left to address. I am working on adding a dark theme for the code snippets, but that might not come until later this week.
